parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain names that you want to include in the operations report. If you do not specify a domain name, all domain names that belong to your Alibaba Cloud account are included.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the operations report. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: ReportIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the metrics that you want to update. Separate IDs with commas (,). You can call the [DescribeDcdnSubList](~~270075~~) operation to query the IDs.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the operations report. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
